title: The Literature of Knowledge - views Milton

content.question: The speaker views Milton as a writer whose works can

choices.label: enlarge one's deep sympathy with truth
teach one how to recognize good literature
give instruction about the nature of life on Earth

content.answer: enlarge one's deep sympathy with truth

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
